name: tailwind-html-includes
description: A simple Tailwind CSS + HTML Includes builder

scripts.build: npm run make_dist && html-includes --src src --dest dist --minify minifyJS=true && node bin/inline-styles.js
scripts.serve: npm run make_dist ; sleep 1 && servor dist --reload --browse & npx tailwindcss -i ./src/_includes/css/tailwind.css -o ./dist/styles.css --watch & html-includes --src src --dest dist --watch
